description: The `<k-box>` component is a multi-purpose box with text. You can use it as a foundation for empty state displays or anything else that needs to be displayed in a box.

examples.title: example
examples.content: <k-box text="This is a nice box" theme="positive" />

props.name: button
props.description: Whether the box should function as a button

props.name: height
props.description: CSS value for the height of the box

props.name: icon
props.description: Optional icon to display in the box

props.name: theme
props.description: Choose one of the pre-defined styles

props.name: text
props.description: Text to display inside the box

props.name: html
props.description: If set to `true`, the `text` is rendered as HTML code, otherwise as plain text
